21-0362.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes for the Federal Legislation Committee meeting held Friday, March 11, 2021.A motion was made by Member Saro, seconded by Vice Chair Supernaw, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 3 - Saro, Supernaw and RichardsonPage 1 of 3TELECONFERENCE, 1:00 PMTHURSDAY, APRIL 29, 2021CITY OF LONG BEACHFEDERAL LEGISLATION COMMITTEE MINUTES2.

21-0363.summary: Recommendation to receive and file a presentation from Charles Small, Deputy Assistant Secretary for Intergovernmental Affairs at the U.S. Department of Transportation, regarding the American Jobs Plan and federal infrastructure investment priorities.Tyler Curley, Manager of Government Affairs, spoke; and introduced, Charles Small, Deputy Assistant Secretary - Intergovernmental Affairs, U.S. Department of Transportation.Charles Small, Deputy Assistant Secretary - Intergovernmental Affairs, U.S. Department of Transportation, spoke.Chair Richardson spoke.A dialogue ensued between Chair Richardson and Charles Small, Deputy Assistant Secretary - Intergovernmental Affairs, U.S. Department of Transportation.Vice Chair Supernaw spoke.Charles Small, Deputy Assistant Secretary - Intergovernmental Affairs, U.S. Department of Transportation, spoke.Councilwoman Saro spoke.Charles Small, Deputy Assistant Secretary - Intergovernmental Affairs, U.S. Department of Transportation, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Councilwoman Saro and Charles Small, Deputy Assistant Secretary - Intergovernmental Affairs, U.S. Department of Transportation.Chair Richardson spoke.Charles Small, Deputy Assistant Secretary - Intergovernmental Affairs, U.S. Department of Transportation, spoke.John Russell, Dentons, spoke.Page 2 of 3TELECONFERENCE, 1:00 PMTHURSDAY, APRIL 29, 2021CITY OF LONG BEACHFEDERAL LEGISLATION COMMITTEE MINUTESA motion was made by Member Saro, seconded by Vice Chair Supernaw, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 3 - Saro, Supernaw and Richardson3.
